ANGLE.HINT: Angle at which to display this namplate.
ANGLE.LABEL: Angle

ENABLE.HINT: Toggle on to enable Token Nameplates for this token.
ENABLE.LABEL: Enable Nameplates

ENABLEGLOBAL.HINT: Toggle on to use default nameplates for this actor type.
ENABLEGLOBAL.LABEL: Enable Default Nameplates

DROPSHADOWALPHA.HINT: Opacity of the drop shadow, if any
DROPSHADOWALPHA.LABEL: Drop Shadow Alpha

DROPSHADOWCOLOR.HINT: The color of the drop shadow, if any
DROPSHADOWCOLOR.LABEL: Drop Shadow Color

ALPHA.LABEL: Alpha
ALPHA.HINT: Level of transparency for the effect

USEDISPOSITIONCOLOR.LABEL: Use Disposition Color
USEDISPOSITIONCOLOR.HINT: Will color this effect based on the token's disposition (hostile, neutral, etc.)

ENABLE.LABEL: Enable Outline
ENABLE.HINT: Add an outline to the nameplate

ENABLE.LABEL: Enable Glow
ENABLE.HINT: Add a glow effect to the nameplate

INNER.LABEL: Inner Strength
INNER.HINT: Strength of the glow inward from the edge of the sprite

OUTER.LABEL: Outer Strength
OUTER.HINT: Strength of the glow outward from the edge of the sprite

PADDING.HINT: Space above and to the left of the nameplate
PADDING.LABEL: Padding

POSITION.HINT: Where to place the nameplate relative to the token
POSITION.LABEL: Position

REMOVE.CONTENT:
Are you sure you want to remove this nameplate?
This cannot be undone.
REMOVE.TITLE: Remove Nameplate

REVERT.LABEL: Revert Settings
REVERT.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to revert these settings back to default?
REVERT.TITLE: Revert Settings

TOOLTIPS.EXPORT: Export the current configuration as JSON

VALUE.HINT:
The value of the label.
See the wiki for information about string interpolation.
VALUE.LABEL: Value
